analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule—which seeks to reintroduce elements of the defunct Schedule F under the new label 'Schedule Policy/Career'—would erode fundamental civil service protections and expose mission-critical roles to arbitrary removal without the due process protections long established under law.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of civil service protections, due process rights, and the risk of politicization, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
